channel.title: 317 PI mapdots
channel.description:
Ok. I know this is client-sided...but Im not too sure how to add sprites...where to add them...and where to write the code
Ive been looking for the last 2 hours on how to do this and im stuck...
So...Im wanting to make it so when an Admin is online it shows the Admin crown on the map...instead of the white dot Also when a mod is online it shows the mod crown...
So...how would I do this?
Please dont call me a noob, just because I dont know how to do this. Its something that Ive always wanted to do...
Thanks in advance :)
